title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, available on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate ‘ollama’ providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to chat with local Ollama models via Slack threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-distrobox
summary: Distrobox container recipe to run Ollama isolated with CUDA drivers.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: ChatGPT retrieval plugin backend that uses Ollama embeddings for semantic search.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package to use Ollama generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that streams responses from Ollama models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama chat/completion endpoints in no-code workflows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization & Q&A commands inside notes.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama models across a Ray cluster.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.
